definition: lit. the toad wants to eat swan meat (idiom)/fig. to try to punch above one's weight
pinyin: lai4 ha2 ma5 xiang3 chi1 tian1 e2 rou4

definition: (bird species of China) whooper swan (Cygnus cygnus)
(bird species of China) tundra swan (Cygnus columbianus)
(bird species of China) tundra swan (Cygnus columbianus)
(bird species of China) mute swan (Cygnus olor)
Wild Swans, family autobiography by British-Chinese writer Jung Chang 張戎|张戎[Zhang1 Rong2]/alternative title 鴻|鸿, after the author's original name 張二鴻|张二鸿[Zhang1 Er4 hong2]

sentences.english: While the White Swan comes easily to Nina, the dark mysteries of the Black Swan evade her.
sentences.chinese: 當白天鵝靠近妮娜的時候，黑天鵝的隱祕躲在暗處。

sentences.english: While the White Swan comes easily to Nina, the dark mysteries of the Black Swan evade her.
sentences.chinese: 當白天鵝靠近妮娜的時候，黑天鵝的隱祕躲在暗處。

sentences.english: The fur was as soft as velvet.
sentences.chinese: 這毛皮有如天鵝絨般軟滑。

sentences.english: He dreamed a black swan and several swallows flying in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 他夢見一隻黑天鵝和幾隻燕子在空中飛翔。

sentences.english: It was soft and slippery. It felt a little like velvet.
sentences.chinese: 海豚的鰭摸起來又軟又滑，感覺有點像天鵝絨。

sentences.english: The beautiful silks and velvets surprised him very much.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的絲綢及天鵝絨令他讚歎不已。

sentences.english: Swan Lake might be a good choice.
sentences.chinese: 天鵝湖是個不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: Who wrote the ballet Swan Lake?
sentences.chinese: 芭蕾舞劇《天鵝湖》是誰寫的？

sentences.english: Petra had been with this swan-shaped boat for years.
sentences.chinese: 蓓特拉已經陪伴在這隻天鵝形踏板船身邊多年了。

sentences.english: The swan soon alighted upon a lake, where he swam and dove.
sentences.chinese: 下車後不久的天鵝湖，他在那裏游泳和鴿子。

sentences.english: A trumpeter swan glides across the surface of the Yellowstone River.
sentences.chinese: 一隻號手天鵝正遊過黃石河的水面。

sentences.english: Eisenbrey is closely watching the Black Swan case.
sentences.chinese: 艾森佈雷正在密切關注這場因《黑天鵝》而起的官司。

sentences.english: Her eyes moved gradually out into the velvet dusk .
sentences.chinese: 她漸漸放眼去看那天鵝絨般的暮色。

sentences.english: Farther east stand the Velvet Hills, whence we are bound.
sentences.chinese: 再遠的東邊屹立着天鵝絨山脈，那裏是我們的邊界了。

sentences.english: That's Albireo, which depicts the Swan's eye or beak.
sentences.chinese: 那就是天鵝星，是它勾畫出了天鵝的眼睛或者是鳥喙。

sentences.english: That's Albireo, which depicts the Swan's eye or beak.
sentences.chinese: 那就是天鵝星，是它勾畫出了天鵝的眼睛或者是鳥喙。

definition: to flutter/to dance in the breeze
to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
